persons.name: Slavoj Žižek
persons.summary: Žižek explored the void at the heart of ideology, challenging both postmodern and liberal interpretations of nihilism with Lacanian psychoanalysis and Marxist theory.
quotes: We feel free because we lack the very language to articulate our unfreedom.

persons.name: Mark Fisher
persons.summary: Fisher critiqued capitalist realism as a manifestation of cultural and political nihilism, where alternatives to capitalism were deemed unthinkable.
quotes: It's easier to imagine the end of the world than the end of capitalism.

events.name: 2008 Financial Crisis
events.description: Global economic collapse led to disillusionment with neoliberal capitalism, fueling nihilistic sentiments about politics and progress.

events.name: Rise of Online Radicalism
events.description: Digital platforms enabled nihilistic ideologies to flourish, from ironic detachment to alt-right fatalism.
